alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit; Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 16 at 4:56PM HST until January 17 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH MIDNIGHT HST FOR INTERIOR AND WINDWARD KAUAI AND OAHU... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE HIGHEST SUMMITS OF THE BIG ISLAND AND MOUNT HALEAKALA ON MAUI... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR NIIHAU MOLOKAI LANAI REMAINING PORTIONS OF OAHU AND KAUAI AND FOR THE LOWER ELEVATIONS OF MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Strong southwest winds will continue through this evening with gusts up to 60 mph possible on portions of Kauai and Oahu as a cold front approaches the area from the west. Strong southwest winds on the summits of the Big Island and Haleakala Summit will continue through Wednesday. ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 75 mph with localized gusts over 90 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Be prepared for road-closures. Postpone travel to the summits until conditions improve.
